archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.5.8a: a) enhancing due diligence measures prior to conducting business with external parties (e.g. by verifying the identity of external parties when establishing business relationships, and checking if they have been subject to a money laundering or a terrorist financing investigation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
